channel.title: Remove ids shown when right clicking
channel.description: I have a client that shows the id of objects, npcs, etc. when I right click. What do I do to remove this?

item.title: Remove ids shown when right clicking
item.dc:creator: @jake_93 jake_93
item.description:
@jake_93 wrote:

If you have the client which has the big frame (Not sure on the name) But the client which at the top has cursors, ip change, port change etcâ€¦ You will have them and im not sure if you can remove.

I would advise on getting a new client.
You can find clients in server download.

Jake

Read full topic
item.source: Remove ids shown when right clicking
